text: Mildred Jane Hill (June 27, 1859 â€“ June 5, 1916) was an American songwriter and musicologist. She was known for composing "Good Morning to All", later used as the melody for "Happy Birthday to You". Born in Louisville, Kentucky, she died in Chicago at the age of 56. ==References== Category:1859 births Category:1916 deaths Category:American songwriters Category:Writers from Louisville, Kentucky
title: Mildred J. Hill
